item.title: AlmaLinux OS Kitten 10 Gives Power Users a Sneak Preview
item.description: If you're looking to kick the tires of AlmaLinux's upstream version, the developers have a purrfect solution.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Gnome 47.1 Released with a Few Fixes
item.description: The latest release of the Gnome desktop is all about fixing a few nagging issues and not about bringing new features into the mix.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: System76 Unveils an Ampere-Powered Thelio Desktop
item.description: If you're looking for a new desktop system for developing autonomous driving and software-defined vehicle solutions. System76 has you covered.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: VirtualBox 7.1.4 Includes Initial Support for Linux kernel 6.12
item.description: The latest version of VirtualBox has arrived and it not only adds initial support for kernel 6.12 but another feature that will make using the virtual machine tool much easier.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: New Slimbook EVO with Raw AMD Ryzen Power
item.description: If you're looking for serious power in a 14" ultrabook that is powered by Linux, Slimbook has just the thing for you.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: The Gnome Foundation Struggling to Stay Afloat
item.description: The foundation behind the Gnome desktop environment is having to go through some serious belt-tightening due to continued financial problems.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Thousands of Linux Servers Infected with Stealth Malware Since 2021
item.description: Perfctl is capable of remaining undetected, which makes it dangerous and hard to mitigate.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Halcyon Creates Anti-Ransomware Protection for Linux
item.description: As more Linux systems are targeted by ransomware, Halcyon is stepping up its protection.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Valve and Arch Linux Announce Collaboration
item.description: Valve and Arch have come together for two projects that will have a serious impact on the Linux distribution.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Hacker Successfully Runs Linux on a CPU from the Early â€˜70s
item.description: From the office of "Look what I can do," Dmitry Grinberg was able to get Linux running on a processor that was created in 1971.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: OSI and LPI Form Strategic Alliance
item.description: With a goal of strengthening Linux and open source communities, this new alliance aims to nurture the growth of more highly skilled professionals.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Fedora 41 Beta Available with Some Interesting Additions
item.description: If you're a Fedora fan, you'll be excited to hear the beta version of the latest release is now available for testing and includes plenty of updates.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: AlmaLinux Unveils New Hardware Certification Process
item.description: The AlmaLinux Hardware Certification Program run by the Certification Special Interest Group (SIG) aims to ensure seamless compatibility between AlmaLinux and a wide range of hardware configurations.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Wind River Introduces eLxr Pro Linux Solution
item.description: eLxr Pro offers an end-to-end Linux solution backed by expert commercial support.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Juno Tab 3 Launches with Ubuntu 24.04
item.description: Anyone looking for a full-blown Linux tablet need look no further. Juno has released the Tab 3.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: New KDE Slimbook Plasma Available for Preorder
item.description: Powered by an AMD Ryzen CPU, the latest KDE Slimbook laptop is powerful enough for local AI tasks.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Rhino Linux Announces Latest "Quick Update"
item.description: If you prefer your Linux distribution to be of the rolling type, Rhino Linux delivers a beautiful and reliable experience.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Plasma Desktop Will Soon Ask for Donations
item.description: The next iteration of Plasma has reached the soft feature freeze for the 6.2 version and includes a feature that could be divisive.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: Linux Market Share Hits New High
item.description: For the first time, the Linux market share has reached a new high for desktops, and the trend looks like it will continue.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Gwen Clark)

item.title: LibreOffice 24.8 Delivers New Features
item.description: LibreOffice is often considered the de facto standard office suite for the Linux operating system.
item.author: webdevel@sparkhausmedia.com (Amy Pettle)
